title: Sweet Caporal Box-Make an offer-Best one gets it -I pay postage

posts.post_title: Sweet Caporal Box-Make an offer-Best one gets it -I pay postage
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Vic Stanley

Sweet Caporal Cigarette Box 

Tax Stamp says Act of Aug 09 1909

Not sure if those two Blue marks on the front are part of the box or Ink

Inside slides out and inside is complete

Crease on Back of the box

Email offers to 

psafootballcom@comcast.net

to see scans
